Verses: 1 akkiramangalinaalum Paavangalinaalum Mariththavargalaayirundha Ungalai Uyirppiththaar.

2 avaigalil Neengal Murkaalaththile Ivvulaga Vazhakkaththirketrapadiyaagavum, Keezhppadiyaamaiyin Pillaigalidaththil Ippozhudhu Kiriyaiseygira Aagaayaththu Adhikaarap Pirabuvin Aavikketrapadiyaagavum Nadandhukondeergal.

3 avargalukkulle Naamellaarum Murkaalaththile Namadhu Maamsa Ichchaiyin Padiye Nadandhu, Namadhu Maamsamum Manasum Virumbinavaigalaich Cheydhu, Subaavaththinaale Matravargalaippolak Kobaakkinaiyin Pillaigalaayirundhom.
4 dhevano Irakkaththil Aisuvariyamullavaraai Nammil Anbukoorndha Thammudaiya Migundha Anbinaale,
5 akkiramangalil Mariththavargalaayirundha Nammaik Kiristhuvudanekooda Uyirppiththaar; Kirubaiyinaale Ratchikkappatteergal.
6 kiristhu Yesuvukkul Avar Nammidaththil Vaiththa Dhayavinaale, Thammudaiya Kirubaiyin Magaa Menmaiyaana Aisuvariyaththai Varunkaalangalil Vilangachseyvadharkaaga,
7 kiristhu Yesuvukkul Nammai Avarodekooda Ezhuppi, Unnadhangalile Avarodekooda Utkaaravum Seydhaar.
8 kirubaiyinaale Visuvaasaththaikkondu Ratchikkappatteergal; Idhu Ungalaal Undaanadhalla, Idhu Dhevanudaiya Eevu;
9 oruvarum Perumaipaaraattaadhapadikku Idhu Kiriyaigalinaal Undaanadhalla;

10 enenil, Narkiriyaigalaich Seygiradharku Naam Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Sirushtikkappattu, Dhevanudaiya Seygaiyaayirukkirom; Avaigalil Naam Nadakkumpadi Avar Munnadhaaga Avaigalai Aayaththampanniyirukkiraar.
11 aanapadiyinaal Munne Maamsaththinpadi Purajaadhiyaaraayirundhu, Maamsaththil Kaiyinaale Seyyappadugira Viruththasedhanamudaiyavargalaal Viruththasedhanamillaadhavargalennappatta Neengal,

12 akkaalaththile Yesukiristhuvai Seraadhavargalum, Israveludaiya Kaaniyaatchikkup Purambaanavargalum, Vaakkuththaththaththin Udanpadikkaigalukku Anniyarum, Nambikkaiyillaadhavargalum, Ivvulagaththil Dhevanatravargalumaayirundheergalendru Ninaiththukkollungal.
13 munne Dhooramaayirundha Neengal Ippozhudhu Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Kiristhuvin Raththaththinaale Sameebamaaneergal.
14 eppadiyenil, Avare Nammudaiya Samaadhaana Kaaranaraagi, Iruthiraththaaraiyum Ondraakki, Pagaiyaaga Nindra Pirivinaiyaagiya Naduchsuvaraith Thagarththu,
15 sattathittangalaagiya Niyaayappiramaanaththaith Thammudaiya Maamsaththinaale Ozhiththu, Iruthiraththaaraiyum Thamakkullaaga Ore Pudhiya Manushanaaga Sirushtiththu, Ippadi Samaadhaanampanni,
16 pagaiyai Siluvaiyinaal Kondru, Adhinaale Iruthiraththaaraiyum Ore Sareeramaaga Dhevanukku Oppuravaakkinaar.
17 allaamalum Avar Vandhu, Dhooramaayirundha Ungalukkum, Sameebamaayirundha Avargalukkum, Samaadhaanaththai Suviseshamaaga Ariviththaar.
18 andhappadiye Naam Iruthiraththaarum Ore Aaviyinaale Pidhaavinidaththil Serum Silaakkiyaththai Avarmoolamaaip Petrirukkirom.
19 aagaiyaal, Neengal Ini Anniyarum Paradhesigalumaayiraamal, Parisuththavaangalode Ore Nagaraththaarum Dhevanudaiya Veettaarumaayirundhu,
20 apposthalar Theerkkadharisigalenbavargaludaiya Asdhibaaraththinmel Kattappattavargalumaayirukkireergal; Adharku Yesukiristhu Thaame Moolaikkallaayirukkiraar;
21 avarmel Maaligai Muzhuvadhum Isaivaai Inaikkappattu, Karththarukkul Parisuththa Aalayamaaga Ezhumpugiradhu;
22 avarmel Neengalum Aaviyinaale Dhevanudaiya Vaasasthalamaagak Koottikkattappattuvarugireergal.
